dauer.label: Regular training duration (months)
dauer.tooltip: The standard duration of your full-time training

stunden.label: Regular weekly hours (total)
stunden.tooltip: Your total weekly hours incl. vocational school

teilzeit.label: Part-time share
teilzeit.tooltip: At least 50% for a recognized part-time apprenticeship

vk.heading: Select reasons for reduction
vk.helper: Choose all reasons that apply to you.

abitur.label: Abitur / Advanced school diploma
abitur.tooltip: If you have Abitur, a reduction may be possible.

realschule.label: Intermediate school diploma
realschule.tooltip: If you have a secondary school diploma, a reduction may be possible.

alter21.label: Age over 21 years
alter21.tooltip: Older trainees can have prior experience credited.

vork.label: Professional experience
vork.tooltip: Practical experience or degrees can shorten your training time.

res.headline: Your part-time apprenticeship
res.helper: Your inputs and the calculated result at a glance.
notes: There is no legal claim to the displayed evaluation.
The final agreement is made with your training company.
For a recognized part-time apprenticeship, at least 50% of the regular training time is required.
